General.Name: Shenzhen Megmeet Electrical Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Megmeet Electrical Co., LTD engages in the research and development, production, sales, and services of hardware, software, and system solutions for electrical automation in China. The company offers industrial power supply products, including subracks, hybrid power supply, PDU, solar modules, controllers, and telecom DC converter and rectifier; external adapters, open frames, battery packs, and custom power products; microwave and electric power supply products; industrial automation products; charging station rectifier modules; and EV electric Parts, such as on-board power supply, power electronic units, motor control units, electric compression, vehicle mounted, and dual motor control units. It also provides rail transit parts, including electric compressors, air-conditioning controllers, motor drivers, and air-conditioning electronic control cabinets; smart home appliances, consisting of visual display products, kitchen appliances, and HVAC; and intelligent toilet and digital welding machine, industrial microwave systems, electric submersible oil pumping systems, optical fiber flexible bend sensors, portable DLP projectors, and disinfecting equipment. The company's products are used in ICT, electrical power, medical device, microwave equipment, business display screen, energy saving and environmental protection, factory and engineering equipment, welding robotic arm, PV energy, electrical vehicle, rail transit, oil field, police equipment, HVAC, smart appliance, sanitary ware, etc. Shenzhen Megmeet Electrical Co., LTD was founded in 2003 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
